Are there any neighborhoods where the average sale price is significantly higher or lower than the overall average?
Are there properties with high overall quality ratings that were built before 1900?
Are there any properties with lot areas more than 3 standard deviations from the mean?
Are there any properties with sale prices beyond 2.5 standard deviations from the mean?
Are there properties where the garage size is inconsistent with the property size?

Is there a correlation between overall quality and sale price?
